name: aiquickfix
displayName: AI QuickFix: Instantly fix problems with Open Source AI
description: Use open-source AI tools to find one-click 'lightbulb menu' solutions to problems in your code.
author: Craig Haseler

haselerdev.aiquickfix.modelEndpoint.description: Endpoint for the local or self-hosted model API (e.g., Ollama, LocalAI)

haselerdev.aiquickfix.modelName.description: Which model to use for AI problem solving. Default is CodeLlama (7B), but you can use other models like WizardCoder, SantaCoder, etc.

haselerdev.aiquickfix.systemPrompt.default: You are functioning in a behind-the-scenes role supporting a code problem fixing extension in VScode. You will be given a problem flagged by a linter or other tool, followed by the code that caused the problem. Please return fixed code for the problem. Make sure the code you return is an exact and full replacement for the code you are sent, and don't ever send any other messages or context, because you don't want those messages to be injected into the code! If you do really need to send an explanation, include it as a comment in the code you send, but it's unlikely you'll need to do that. If you can't fix the problem, reply only with the exact message 'I can't fix this problem' and nothing else.
haselerdev.aiquickfix.systemPrompt.description: The system prompt giving the AI the initial instructions on what it is and what it does.

haselerdev.aiquickfix.problemPrefix.description: Text to add in front of the section from your linter describing the problem. Blank seems to work fine.

haselerdev.aiquickfix.problemCodePrefix.description: Text to add in front of the code block context. Blank seems to work fine.

haselerdev.aiquickfix.promptSuffix.default: Please, please remember to only send the fixed code, and nothing else or it will break the user's code and make them sad!
haselerdev.aiquickfix.promptSuffix.description: Text to add after everything else. This is a good place to remind the AI to follow the format please.

haselerdev.aiquickfix.maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate in the response

haselerdev.aiquickfix.temperature.description: Temperature for model generation (0.0-1.0). Lower values for more deterministic outputs.

haselerdev.aiquickfix.backgroundFix.enab.description: Enable automatic background fixing of code issues

haselerdev.aiquickfix.backgroundFix.file.description: File types to monitor for automatic fixes

haselerdev.aiquickfix.backgroundFix.rate.description: Minimum time (in milliseconds) between automatic fixes

haselerdev.aiquickfix.backgroundFix.seve.description: Diagnostic severity levels to fix automatically

scripts.vscode:prepublish: yarn run compile && yarn run esbuild-base -- --minify
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run esbuild-base -- --minify
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
